title: U.S. Consulates in Canada - Find U.S....
text:
Expert Videos 
Overview: 
U.S. consulates are located across Canada, with the U.S. Embassy in the national capital of Ottawa. Before you visit the U.S. Embassy or any of the U.S. consulates in Canada, call ahead. Many services are by appointment only and are offered at irregular hours. Be prepared for your visit by having all the necessary items with you. Nothing is more frustrating than getting to a government office only to be turned away - even more frustrating than waiting on hold on the telephone, so call before you go.Also, U.S. travelers to Canada are encouraged to register their trips abroad online . 
The Embassy of the United States of America, Ottawa: 
490 Sussex DriveOttawa, Ontario K1N 1G8 CanadaTel: 613-238-5335 US Embassy Ottawa Website Good to Know: The American Citizen Services Section is open weekdays from 8AM to 12PM. This office is closed on Wednesdays and holidays. The US Embassy in Ottawa provides services for Eastern Ontario (Kingston, Lanark, Leeds, Prescott, Renfrew, Russell and Stormont) and those parts of the Quebec regions of Outaouais and Abitibi-Temiscamingue 
U.S. Consulate General Vancouver:
